body_html: @zhanghang1989 I haven't noticed anything but I haven't worked with very large models or minibatch sizes in Pytorch. Most of what I've been doing has been below 4-6 GB of GPU memory, so it hasn't been anywhere close to being a problem even when training multiple models on the same GPU.

body: @zhanghang1989 I haven't noticed anything but I haven't worked with very large models or minibatch sizes in Pytorch. Most of what I've been doing has been below 4-6 GB of GPU memory, so it hasn't been anywhere close to being a problem even when training multiple models on the same GPU.
